leukapp.apps.core.models module¶

Abstract models used across the leukapp project.

class TimeStampedModel(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

An abstract base class model that provides self-updating created and modified fields.

See: http://blog.kevinastone.com/django-model-behaviors.html

class LeukappModel(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: leukapp.apps.core.models.TimeStampedModel

Leukapp abstract base model.

This model has several methods that are shared across the Leukapp project. This implementation is mainly motivated by the DRY concept.

class Meta[source]¶

Bases: object

abstract = False¶
LeukappModel.save(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Atomic method to save the LeukappModel.

While executed, calls two methods:

  • _if_new(): only called at creation, used to generate IDs.
  • _if_save(): called every time the object is saved.

The slug identification system is based on the use of primary keys. As such, the LeukappModel must be saved before generating the slug.

The keyword argument force_insert is set to False in order to avoid error while using create() (see this question).

LeukappModel.get_absolute_url()[source]¶

Returns the object detail url.

LeukappModel.get_update_url()[source]¶

Returns the object’s update url.
